Text:
thanks for the up! i absolutely love this song.

felt the need to mention: this song is NOT from the original album departure. the album was re-released as 'departure: recharged' as this song came out quite a while after the album. i have the original departure album and this song is not on it.

No problem, brent825!
btw, what I meant was, I don't know for sure from what album the version with T-Pain was taken (or if it was released as a single). But I know the ORIGINAL version is in "Departure".
In any case, ENJOY!
